meanings.definition: A meeting or conference for discussion of a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The symposium on climate change brought together experts from around the world.
meanings.sent2: I attended a symposium on renewable energy last week.
meanings.sent3: The symposium on alien invasions was out of this world!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a symposium of ideas, each one vying for attention.
meanings.sent5: The symposium buzzed with intellectual energy, sparking new ideas and collaborations.

meanings.definition: A collection of writings on a particular topic, usually published together.
meanings.sent1: The symposium of ancient Greek texts shed light on their culture.
meanings.sent2: I found a symposium of Shakespearean sonnets at the library.
meanings.sent3: The symposium of fairy tales was a magical read.
meanings.sent4: Her bookshelf was a symposium of literary treasures.
meanings.sent5: The symposium of scientific papers provided valuable insights into the field.
